description.raw:
A model may have several versions, which are numbered starting from 1 and `tip` refers to the latest available version.

The new local cache structure is the following:

~~~
/home/louise/.ignition/fuel/
├── config.yaml
└── localhost:8000
    └── chapulina
        └── models
            └── Custom drill
                ├── 1
                │   ├── materials
                │   │   └── textures
                │   │       └── cordless_drill.png
                │   ├── meshes
                │   │   ├── cordless_drill.dae
                │   │   └── cordless_drill.stl
                │   ├── model.config
                │   └── model.sdf
                ├── 2
                │   ├── materials
                │   │   └── textures
                │   │       └── cordless_drill.png
                │   ├── meshes
                │   │   ├── cordless_drill.dae
                │   │   └── cordless_drill.stl
                │   ├── model.config
                │   └── model.sdf
                └── (no more tip symlink!)
~~~

Note that the `tip` is a symlink to the highest version, in this case `2`.

You can test this using the command line tool like this for example:

~~~
ign fuel download -v 4 --force-version 1.1.0 -u "https://api.ignitionfuel.org/1.0/chapulina/models/Test box"
~~~

Note that when downloading the tip, the version will be hardcoded to 1 until [this PR](https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-fuelserver/pull-requests/135/return-x-ign-resource-version-header-in/diff) is deployed on the backend.

title: Cache model versions side-by-side
